channel.title: Runecrafting
channel.description: I need to figure out how to set the required levels for the altars to craft on so you can't craft death runes with 1 runecrafting.

item.title: Runecrafting
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:7, topic:515649”]Normally it’s structured something like so:

if(c.hasReqs){
     //Do this
}else { //This means if they don't meet the requirements above
     c.sendMessage("Some sort of fail printout here.");
}

But before it gets to that, there’s usually a check to see if they player has the item.

if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(RUNE_ESS_ID)){
     //Do stuff
}else { //Again, only happens if they don't meet reqs above
     c.sendMessage("You're missing item XXXX");
}

All together:

if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(RUNE_ESS_ID)){ if(c.hasReqs){ //Do this }else { //This means if they don't meet the requirements above c.sendMessage("Some sort of fail printout here."); } }else { //This shows when you don't meet the main res (not having item(s)) c.sendMessage("You don't have item XXXX."); } [/quote]You have to spoonfeed him? lol

Read full topic

item.title: Runecrafting
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Normally it’s structured something like so:

if(c.hasReqs){
     //Do this
}else { //This means if they don't meet the requirements above
     c.sendMessage("Some sort of fail printout here.");
}

But before it gets to that, there’s usually a check to see if they player has the item.

if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(RUNE_ESS_ID)){
     //Do stuff
}else { //Again, only happens if they don't meet reqs above
     c.sendMessage("You're missing item XXXX");
}

All together:

if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(RUNE_ESS_ID)){
     if(c.hasReqs){
          //Do this
     }else { //This means if they don't meet the requirements above
          c.sendMessage("Some sort of fail printout here.");
     }
}else { //This shows when you don't meet the main res (not having item(s))
     c.sendMessage("You don't have item XXXX.");
}

Read full topic

item.title: Runecrafting
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

i’d suggest you reading a little about java and you wouldn’t be asking for this little stuff, for something like that you need to add an IF STATEMENT I dont know wich methods you have because you didn’t provide your source name but i hope this builds a bit.

/* * The runecrafting method */ public void runeCraft(int theSHITSLOL) { /* * Here is where you have to add the requirements... * the [1]means the id of the skill and the 15 the required levels * it only work if it equals 15 so, if you want it from 15 not just 15 * you'll have to do something like this. if(c.playerlevel[SKILLID] >= 15 */ if(c.playerLevel[1] == 15) { /* * The runecrafting here. */ } }

Read full topic
